summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1288, for the improvement of Washington Street, in the City of Seattle, from 3rd Avenue South to 4th Avenue South; by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with granite curbs, brick gutters and all necessary water mains, with appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13980, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof, shown on said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
